mapper.select: SELECT A.user_no , A.user_id , A.user_nm , A.user_eml_addr , COALESCE(user_dept_no, 1) AS user_dept_no , A.user_aprv_yn , B.dept_nm FROM public."user" A LEFT JOIN public."dept" B ON A.user_dept_no = B.dept_no
mapper.insert:
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(user_no), 0)+1 AS userNo FROM public.user
INSERT INTO public.user ( user_no , user_id , user_nm , user_eml_addr , user_aprv_yn ) VALUES ( #{userNo}::INTEGER , #{userId} , #{userNm} , #{userEmlAddr} , 'n' )
mapper.select: SELECT user_no , user_id , user_nm , user_eml_addr , COALESCE(user_dept_no, 0) AS user_dept_no , COALESCE(user_telno, ' ') AS user_telno , COALESCE(user_addr, ' ') AS user_addr , user_aprv_yn FROM public.user WHERE user_no=#{userNo}
